mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex, u.realname, u.AVATAR, u.DESCRIPTION, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, (select count(1) from sys_login_log log where log.username = u.username) as loginTime, u.user_type userType FROM sys_user u where u.mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex, u.realname, d.dept_id deptId, d.dept_name deptName, u.AVATAR, u.DESCRIPTION, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, (select count(1) from sys_login_log log where log.username = u.username) as loginTime, u.user_type userType, array_to_string(array_agg(r.role_id), ',') roleId, array_to_string(array_agg(r.ROLE_NAME), ',') roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_type = '0'
AND u.username like CONCAT('%', #{user.username}, '%')
AND u.realname like CONCAT('%', #{user.realname}, '%')
AND u.mobile like CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
AND d.dept_id IN ( with recursive subdept as ( select t.dept_id, t.parent_id, t.dept_name from sys_dept t where t.dept_id = #{user.deptId}::bigint union all select m.dept_id, m.parent_id, m.dept_name from sys_dept m inner join subdept s on s.dept_id = m.parent_id ) select s.dept_id from subdept s )
And u.create_time::date > #{user.createTimeFrom}::date
And u.create_time::date < #{user.createTimeTo}::date
AND u.ssex = #{user.ssex}
AND u.status = #{user.status}
AND r.role_id = #{user.roleId}::bigint
group by u.user_id, d.dept_id

SELECT distinct u.*, case when s.id is not null then '主责人' else '监护人' end as roleName, (select count(1) from sys_login_log log where log.username = u.username) as loginTime, (select string_agg(st.name, ',' order by st.id asc) from t_student st where st.id = any (g.student_id) and st.deleted = false) as studentName FROM sys_user u RIGHT JOIN t_guardian g on u.user_id = g.user_id and g.deleted = false LEFT JOIN t_student s ON s.main_guardian_id = g.user_id and s.deleted = false where u.user_id is not null -- and g.student_id is not null and cardinality(g.student_id) > 0
AND u.username like CONCAT('%', #{user.username}, '%')
AND u.user_id::text like CONCAT('%', #{user.userId}, '%')
AND u.mobile like CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
And u.create_time::date > #{user.createTimeFrom}::date
And u.create_time::date < #{user.createTimeTo}::date
AND u.ssex = #{user.ssex}
AND u.status = #{user.status}
AND u.realname like CONCAT('%', #{user.realname}, '%')
and g.id =any (select v.id from v_guardian_student v where v.student_name like CONCAT('%', #{user.studentName}, '%'))
order by u.user_id desc

SELECT u.*, '游客' roleName, (select count(1) from sys_login_log log where log.username = u.username) as loginTime FROM sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where r.role_id = 10
AND u.username like CONCAT('%', #{user.username}, '%')
AND u.user_id::text like CONCAT('%', #{user.userId}, '%')
AND u.mobile like CONCAT('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
And u.create_time::date > #{user.createTimeFrom}::date
And u.create_time::date < #{user.createTimeTo}::date
AND u.ssex = #{user.ssex}
AND u.status = #{user.status}
AND u.realname like CONCAT('%', #{user.realname}, '%')
order by u.user_id desc

SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.realname, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex, d.dept_id deptId, d.dept_name deptName, u.AVATAR, u.DESCRIPTION, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, u.user_type userType, array_to_string(array_agg(r.role_id), ',') roleId, array_to_string(array_agg(r.ROLE_NAME), ',') roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.user_id, d.dept_id

SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex, d.dept_id deptId, d.dept_name deptName, u.AVATAR, u.DESCRIPTION, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, u.user_type userType, array_to_string(array_agg(r.role_id), ',') roleId, array_to_string(array_agg(r.ROLE_NAME), ',') roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.dept_id = any(#{deptIdList}) group by u.user_id, d.dept_id

select u.* from sys_user u left join t_student s on s.main_guardian_id = u.user_id and s.deleted = false left join t_route_operation ro on ro.deleted = false and ro.id = s.route_operation_id where ro.bind_bus_teacher_id = #{busTeacherId} or ro.bind_driver_id = #{busTeacherId}

select u.* from sys_user u left join t_student s on s.main_guardian_id = u.user_id and s.deleted = false left join t_route_operation ro on ro.deleted = false and ro.id = s.route_operation_id where ro.bind_bus_id = #{busId}

select u.* from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id where u.dept_id = (select b.dept_id from t_bus b where b.bus_code = #{busCode} and b.deleted = false) and ur.role_id = 4

select u.* from sys_user u left join t_route_operation ro on u.user_id = ro.bind_driver_id and ro.deleted = false where ro.bind_bus_id = (select b.id from t_bus b where b.bus_code = #{busCode} and b.deleted = false)
select u.* from sys_user u where u.user_id = any (select g.user_id from t_guardian g where #{studentId} =any(g.student_id) and g.deleted = false)
select * from sys_user t where t.user_id =any(select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id = #{roleId})
